app.title: Sisitemu yo Gutanga Raporo y'Ibyaha
app.welcome: Murakaza neza kuri Sisitemu yo Gutanga Raporo y'Ibyaha
complaint.title: Ibirego
complaint.existingEvidence: Ufite {{count}} dosiye y'ibimenyetso byatanzwe kuri iyi kirego. Kongeraho ibimenyetso bishya ntibizasimbuza ibyahozeho.
validation.passwordMinLength: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 8
validation.passwordPattern: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba nibura n'inyuguti nkuru imwe, inyuguti ntoya imwe, imibare imwe na karaktere yihariye imwe
validation.firstNameMinLength: Izina rya mbere rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 2
validation.lastNameMinLength: Izina ry'umuryango rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 2
validation.usernameMinLength: Izina ry'ukoresha rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 3
validation.phoneInvalid: Nyabuneka shyiramo nomero ya telefoni yemewe
actions.title: Ibikorwa
auth.loginSubtitle: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo winjire mu konte yawe
auth.registerSubtitle: Baza konti ya kugira ngo utange ikibazo kandi ukurikire ibirego byawe
auth.scan: Gusikana kode QR n'app yawe yo kwemeza
auth.enterCode: Shyiramo kode yo kwemeza uvana mu app yawe yo kwemeza
auth.secretKey: Niba udashobora gusikana kode QR, koresha iyi nyungu y'ibanga:
auth.twoFactorExplanation: Kugira ngo dukuze umutekano w'akonte yawe, dukoresha kwemeza kuri imeyili. Uzakira kode yo kwemeza kuri imeyili buri gihe winjira.
auth.verificationCodeSent: Kode yo kwemeza yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe. Nyabuneka reba inbox yawe na spam folder.
auth.checkEmailForCode: Nyabuneka reba imeyili yawe kugira ngo ubone kode y'imibare 6 yo kwemeza.
forgotPassword.title: Kwibagirwa Ijambo ry'Ibanga
forgotPassword.enterEmail: Shyiramo imeyili yawe maze tuzakoherereza kode y'imibare 6 yo gusubiza ijambo ryawe ry'ibanga.
forgotPassword.enterCode: Nyabuneka shyiramo kode y'imibare 6 yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe.
messages.loginFailed: Kwinjira byanze. Nyabuneka, kosora umwirondoro wawe
messages.registerSuccess: Kwiyandikisha byagenze neza. Nyabuneka injira kugira ngo ukomeze
messages.registerFailed: Kwiyandikisha byanze. Nyabuneka suzuma amakuru yawe ukongere
messages.sessionExpired: Igihe cyawe kirangiye. Nyabuneka ongera winjire.
messages.insufficientPermissions: Igihe cyawe kirangiye cyangwa nta burenganzira buhagije ufite.
messages.serverError: Hari ikibazo cya seriveri. Nyabuneka mwongere mugerageze nyuma.
messages.networkError: Hari ikibazo cy'umurongo. Nyabuneka suzuma umurongo wawe.
messages.departmentError: Ikibazo mu guhitamo ishami. Nyabuneka hitamo ishami nyaryo hanyuma ugerageze nanone.
messages.mfaSetupSuccess: Uburyo bwo kwemeza kabiri bwateguwe neza
messages.mfaRequired: Nyabuneka shyiramo kode yo kwemeza uvana mu app yawe yo kwemeza
messages.mfaSetupFailed: Gutegura uburyo bwo kwemeza kabiri byanze. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
messages.passwordResetRequestSuccess: Kode yo gusubiza yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe
messages.passwordResetRequestFailed: Gusaba gusubiza ijambo ry'ibanga byanze. Nyabuneka reba imeyili yawe maze ugerageze nanone.
messages.passwordResetCodeVerified: Kode yemejwe neza. Nyabuneka shyiramo ijambo ryawe rishya ry'ibanga.
messages.passwordResetCodeInvalid: Kode yo kwemeza ntiyemewe. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
messages.passwordResetSuccess: Ijambo ryawe ry'ibanga ryasubijwe neza. Ushobora kwinjira ubu.
messages.passwordResetFailed: Gusubiza ijambo ry'ibanga byanze. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
messages.mfaSetupSkipped: Gutegura uburyo bwo kwemeza kabiri byakirikiwe. Ushobora kubwemeza nyuma mu mahitamo y'umwirondoro wawe.
messages.enterTwoFactorCode: Nyabuneka shyiramo kode yawe yo kwemeza kabiri
messages.invalidTwoFactorCode: Kode yo kwemeza kabiri ntiyemewe. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
messages.connectionError: Ntabwo dushobora kwinjira kuri seriveri. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze nyuma.
messages.codeSent: Kode yo kwemeza yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe
messages.errorResendingCode: Hari ikibazo mu kohereza kode yo kwemeza. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
messages.invalidVerificationCode: Kode yo kwemeza ntiyemewe. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
profile.title: Umwirondoro Wanjye
profile.addressReadOnly: Kuvugurura aderesi ntibifashishwa ubu. Aha hari aho ureba gusa.
dashboard.title: Ikibaho
